-- | Digestive functors support for Spock
--   
@package Spock-digestive
@version 0.1.0.1

module Web.Spock.Digestive

-- | Run a digestive functors form
runForm :: (Functor m, MonadIO m) => Text -> Form v (ActionT m) a -> ActionT m (View v, Maybe a)
